attributes.action: Reveal exactly what story the BBC was forced not to run on the news
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An injunction was obtained by the attorney general to prevent the BBC running a story on the cash for honours scandal.  The BBC state reporting the story is in the public interest and I agree I think the prime minister should take action to ensure full details are released to the public as soon as possible as surely in a Democracy information on an issue of such importance should not be covered up.

reasons: Information which may be protected by an injunction or court order
